body_html:
@dominic-rossi the data_parallel I import from is the exact file that houses nn.DataParallel. I just pulled the 0.2.0 changes and the issue remains.

I'm going to assume your machine does not have 4 K80 GPUs. As far as I can tell, this is specific to either the Tesla architectures as a whole or the K80 GPU specifically, since other people have reportedly been running multi-gpu on GTX cards.

body:
@dominic-rossi the `data_parallel` I import from is the exact file that houses `nn.DataParallel`. I just pulled the 0.2.0 changes and the issue remains.

I'm going to assume your machine does not have 4 K80 GPUs. As far as I can tell, this is specific to either the Tesla architectures as a whole or the K80 GPU specifically, since other people have reportedly been running multi-gpu on GTX cards.
